
                            
                            <p>看碗底，我猜测这米饭就是在这碗里煮熟的 <br> 有单子了放微波炉加热。。。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/131331yurfgz3ark83r7rr.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/28/131331yurfgz3ark83r7rr.jpg"> <br>  </p>
